title: Has America Been Overtaken by Creeping Credentialism?
sub_head: Library-science degrees, hotel management degrees, journalism degrees: Is a college degree necessary for nearly every white-collar job these days?
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students debate “credentialism,” the ever-expanding requirement of college degrees. Next week we’ll ask: What is the most dangerous flash point for American foreign policy in the coming year? Taiwan? Iran? Or somewhere else? Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Nov. 3. The best responses will be published that night.
